objects.description: [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has utilized a "magic packet" value in C2 communications and only executes in memory when response packets match specific values.(Citation: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta Toneshell February 2025)(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload)(Citation: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta TONESHELL June 2023)
